name: CVE-2022-40903
description: Aiphone GT-DMB-N 3-in-1 Video Entrance Station with NFC Reader 1.0.3 does not mitigate against repeated failed access attempts, which allows an attacker to gain administrative privileges.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:aiphone:gt-dmb-n_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:aiphone:gt-dmb-n:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:aiphone:gt-dmb_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:aiphone:gt-dmb:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:aiphone:gt-dmb-lvn_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:aiphone:gt-dmb-lvn:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:aiphone:gt-db-vn_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:aiphone:gt-db-vn:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
